title: How to create health care centaurs, half doctors and half managers

title_detail.value: How to create health care centaurs, half doctors and half managers

summary: If hospital doctors around the world often struggle to become those health centaurs, half professionals and half managers, that modern healthcare organizations need, the main responsibility is not their resistance to change, but the lack of effective support from the organization, according to a new study.
